title: William Ackman Takes Stake in Canadian Pacific
sub_head: Investment worth more than $1 billion marks a return to railroad for billionaire
body:
Billionaire investor William Ackman acquired a stake in Canadian Pacific Railway Ltd. as the railroad seeks regulatory approval for its proposed $27 billion merger with Kansas City Southern.
Mr. Ackmanâ€™s hedge fund Pershing Square Capital Management disclosed in a regulatory filing that it owned roughly 2.8 million shares of Canadian Pacific as of Dec. 31.
